content: VMFCSQ4200I VMFCSQ2760I CSMQUERY processing completed successfully (RC=0) VMFCMG2760I SERVMGR processing completed successfully (RC=0) Ready; We saw that the Current Service Level for the managed system is now RSU1. We also tried a display of the service level by using SERVMGR SRVLVL QUERY. The result of this command is shown in Example 9-24.
